field.name: summary
field.value: ERROR NHibernate.Persister.GetSetHelperFactory - Line:12, Column:3 Message: type "Castle.ActiveRecord.ActiveRecordBase" you must add a reference to Castle.ActiveRecord, Version=0.0.1.7, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=407dd0808d44fbdc

field.name: description
field.value:
normal,the page worked no error, but because of when I was want to use access,but it doesn't work, so I set the Log4Net, then during my test and check, it can work, but in the log ,I find it
below is the detail http://jira.nhibernate.org/secure/ManageAttachments.jspa?id=11561 http://jira.nhibernate.org/secure/attachment/10781/Panda.Model.DataMgr.rar
